greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest positive integer having the same number of divisors as n.
comment: a(n) <= n for all n. Moreover, a(n) = n if and only if n belongs to A005179.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) A140635(n) = { my(nd = numdiv(n)); for (i=1, n, if (numdiv(i) == nd, return (i))); }; \\ After A139770, _Antti Karttunen_, May 27 2017
from sympy import divisor_count as d
xref: Cf. A019505, A138113, A061300 (sequences that can be defined in terms of this sequence).
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_, May 19 2008
